events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin the review process shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department based on your experience and skills.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
We completed an initial screening of your profile and experience, and you meet the basic requirements for this software developer role.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirming your availability for the next steps in the recruitment process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC with our senior software engineer.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 11 AM UTC to discuss your fit within the company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the recruiter noted your enthusiasm and alignment with the company values.
We have formally proposed an offer for the software engineer position including your preferred salary and benefits.
We have received your feedback on the offer, and you have expressed your enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
You have officially accepted our offer, and we look forward to having you start as part of our engineering team.
Your onboarding process has commenced, including access setup and introduction to the development teams and tools.
The hiring process is now completed, and we officially welcome you as a new software engineer in our company.
